content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide personal recommendations. However, it all depends on your personal interests and the time of year you plan to visit. If you're interested in architecture, Sherbrooke's Doors Open event might be the best to attend. If you're interested in music and cultural events, then the Jazz and Blues Festival or Fête du Lac des Nations might be more up your alley. You can check the Sherbrooke tourism website for more information on events and activities to help decide which one fits your preferences.
